name: ExPoseAtHome.Card 2."Orange game"
description:
ExPoseAtHome cards. 
I created a geometrical form in a kitchen space and played with my favourite fruit - orange!
This series I’ve been created for 2 years. It consists of photos, gifs or short dance videos in different places inside the apartments I’ve been living in. With my body geometry I’ve tried to find a new context for usual things.

I want to encourage more people to get inspiration from simple around us and everyday routine.
Each piece has a magical dose of inspiration for you
